name: takemycode-dynamic-list
description: Dynamic list implemented via ExpressJS and React with a Vercel-based hosting
author: lilliputten@gmail.com

scripts.type-check: echo --Run typescript linter-- && pnpm --filter server run type-check && pnpm --filter client run type-check
scripts.eslint-debug: echo --Lint sources with eslint in debug mode-- && cross-env DEBUG=eslint:cli-engine eslint .
scripts.eslint-fix: echo --Lint and auto-fix sources with eslint-- && eslint --fix .
scripts.lint-all: echo --Run all pre-commit check-ups-- && npm-run-all stylelint eslint type-check && echo --All check-ups passed--
scripts.check-all: echo --Run all pre-commit check-ups-- && npm-run-all prettier lint-all && echo --All checks passed--
scripts.build: pnpm clean-all-builds && pnpm --filter server run build && pnpm --filter client run build
scripts.vercel-publish: echo --Build and upload pre-built bundles-- && pnpm build && vercel --prod && pnpm vercel-clean
